data.name: Argent Confessor
data.descr: On separate visits to the Trial of the Champion, get credit for defeating Argent Confessor Paletress after suppressing five different memories of the past on Heroic Difficulty.
data.tooltip:
Argent Confessor

On separate visits to the Trial of the Champion, get credit for defeating Argent Confessor Paletress after suppressing five different memories of the past on Heroic Difficulty.

Criteria:
- Hogger
- Mutanus
- Lucifron
- Chromaggus
- Vek\'nilash
- Malchezaar
- Vashj
- Illidan
- M\'uru
- Cyanigosa
- Onyxia
- Ignis
- Algalon
- VanCleef
- Herod
- Thunderaan
- Hakkar
- Kalithresh
- Gruul
- Archimonde
- Delrissa
- Ingvar
- Eck
- Heigan
- Vezax
